snippet: The family of Mr. Gelb will hold a public service on Tuesday at 1:30 p.m. honoring the former editor and critic for The New York Times who died in May at 90.
abstract: Public service will be held to honor Arthur Gelb, former editor and critic for The New York Times who died in May at age 90, at Eugene O'Neill Theater in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The family of Mr. Gelb will hold a public service on Tuesday at 1:30 p.m. honoring the former editor and critic for The New York Times who died in May at 90.
